# Hyundai Steel profit plunges on demand downturn

- [30 Jan 2026 11:56](https://news.az/time/2026/1/30 "30 Jan 2026 11:56")

- 1047542
- [Economics](https://news.az/category/economy "Economics")
- Share[![Facebook share](https://news.az/img/fb32.png)](https://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=https://news.az/news/hyundai-steel-profit-plunges-on-demand-downturn) [![Twitter share](https://news.az/img/x32.png)](https://twitter.com/share?url=https://news.az/news/hyundai-steel-profit-plunges-on-demand-downturn) [![Whatsapp share](https://news.az/img/whatsapp32.png)](whatsapp://send?text=https://news.az/news/hyundai-steel-profit-plunges-on-demand-downturn) [![Linkedin share](https://news.az/img/linkedin32.png)](https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=https://news.az/news/hyundai-steel-profit-plunges-on-demand-downturn) [![Telegram share](https://news.az/img/telegram32.png)](https://telegram.me/share/url?url=https://news.az/news/hyundai-steel-profit-plunges-on-demand-downturn) [![Email share](https://news.az/img/mail32.png)](mailto:?Subject=Hyundai%20Steel%20profit%20plunges%20on%20demand%20downturn&Body=https://news.az/news/hyundai-steel-profit-plunges-on-demand-downturn) ![url-copy](https://news.az/img/url32.png)https://news.az/news/hyundai-steel-profit-plunges-on-demand-downturnCopied

![Hyundai Steel profit plunges on demand downturn](https://news.az/photos/2026/01/1769759982.webp)

Photo: Reuters

+↺−16px

**Hyundai Steel, South Korea’s second-largest steel producer, said on Friday that its net profit plunged 84 percent in 2025 from a year earlier, hurt by a prolonged downturn in the construction sector and rising global protectionism.**

Net profit fell to 1.4 billion won ($970,000) from 8.8 billion won a year earlier, the company said in a press release, [News.Az](https://news.az/) reports, citing [Yonhap](https://en.yna.co.kr/view/AEN20260130007600320).
